sentence.Network_en: The country's 37 million people are wretchedly poor.
"I made it all up," she said wretchedly.
sentence.Network_cn: “这都是我编出来的。”她难过地说。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 可怜的用英语怎么说_百度知道 ... pitiful 可怜的，令人同情的。 wretchedly 可怜地 wretchedness 可怜.

list.abs: the idea that an infusion of hope can make a big difference to the lives of wretchedly poor people sounds like something dreamed up by a well-meaning activist or a tub-thumping politician .灌输希望，对可怜的穷人的生活有着很重要的意义，这种观念听起来似乎像是由好心的社会活动家或者激昂的政客想出来的。
suffer terribly 深受痛苦suffer wretchedly 可怜地忍受～+介词

entry.def: You describe someone as wretched when you feel sorry for them because they are in an unpleasant situation or have suffered unpleasant experiences.

example.ex: You have built up a huge property empire by buying from wretched people who had to sell or starve.
example.tran: 你靠从那些不卖房就得挨饿的可怜人手里买下房子后建立起了庞大的房产帝国。

entry.def: You use wretched to describe someone or something that you dislike or feel angry with.

example.ex: Wretched woman, he thought, why the hell can't she wait?...
example.tran: 他想，可恶的女人，她怎么就不能等一等呢？

example.ex: Theft is something that really disgusts me. It makes me feel hateful towards this whole wretched island.
example.tran: 偷窃是让我深恶痛绝的事情，它让我对这整个该死的岛都充满仇视。

entry.def: Someone who feels wretched feels very unhappy.

example.ex: I feel really confused and wretched...
example.tran: 我觉得十分迷惘，难过极了。

example.ex: The wretched look on the little girl's face made him sorry.
example.tran: 小女孩脸上痛苦的表情让他很难受。

entry.def: If you describe something as wretched, you are emphasizing that it is very bad or of very poor quality.

example.ex: The pay has always been wretched.

sentences.sentence: "`I can't remember who I am,' I said, wretchedly"

auth_sentence.content: Shephard's book was wretchedly lacking and highly selective.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shephard's book was wretchedly lacking and highly selective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shephard's book was wretchedly lacking and highly selective.

auth_sentence.content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a prodigious philanderer who was wretchedly sterile.

auth_sentence.content: A single calf in a pen, lowing wretchedly at regular intervals.
auth_sentence.res_content: A single calf in a pen, lowing wretchedly at regular intervals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A single calf in a pen, lowing wretchedly at regular intervals.

sentences.en: He had made me wretchedly conscious of my shortcomings; that is how he had me on the hook.
sentences.cn: 他使我非常痛苦地意识到自己的缺点，所以他才能任意摆布我。
